title: Revised Training Plan
description: Adjusted training plan to accommodate weight-bearing with a protective boot, focusing on ankle rehab and core exercises.

title: Doctor Visit & X Ray
description: Got my X Ray done and met with Dr. Kamalakar, although the X Rays were good, I was advised to continue with the rehabilitation and come back for a visit on February 3rd in order to assess the status and then make a decision on walking with an air boot.

title: Strength Session
description: Focus on upper body strength. Pushed hard on chest, shoulders and core

title: Mobility Session
description: Focus on lower body mobility and core strength. 20 mins of dynamic stretching and 3 mins of planks.

title: Strength Maintenance
description: Low on energy, but still powered through some strength maintenance exercises like banded rows, face pulls and bicep curls with bands.

title: PT Session: Mobility Breakthrough
description: Significant progress in ankle dorsiflexion. PT cleared me for light weight-bearing exercises with boot support.

title: Active Recovery Sunday
description: Focus on inflammation reduction and core stability. 30 mins guided visualization for mental prep.

title: Strength Maintenance
description: Upper body circuit to maintain muscle mass while lower body heals. Seated cable rows and overhead press focus.

title: New Year, New Protocol
description: Transitioning to Phase 2 of rehabilitation. Increased volume of non-weight bearing cardio.
